name: Julia McCullough
description: Julia McCullough, a talented magician's assistant and Robert Angier's wife, plays a tragic role in 'The Prestige'.

content.title: Background
content.body: Julia McCullough is a character in 'The Prestige', portrayed by Piper Perabo. She is an essential part of the magic act alongside her husband, Robert Angier, and his partner, Alfred Borden.

content.title: Personality
content.body: Julia is depicted as a caring and talented individual. Despite her strong commitment to the magic act and her husband, she becomes a tragic figure due to her untimely death, which profoundly impacts the other main characters.

content.title: Story Role
content.body: Julia's death serves as a pivotal moment in the story, instigating the main conflict between Robert Angier and Alfred Borden. Her tragic accident during a water tank escape trick sets off a series of events that drive the narrative forward.

content.title: Relationships
content.body: Julia is married to Robert Angier, sharing a deep bond with him both personally and professionally. Her professional relationship with Alfred Borden becomes strained due to her accidental death, which Borden is implicated in causing.
